column2: climate models have overestimated the amount of global warming and failed to predict what climatologists call the warming ‘hiatus’
column10: Daily Wire article incorrectly claims climate models have overestimated warming

column2: the warming is not nearly as great as the climate change computer models have predicted.

column2: Marine life has nothing whatsoever to fear from ocean acidification.
